p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS annotated 'No 69' of 74 receipts covering materials supplied for the Intercolonial Exhibition of Australasia, Melbourne, 1866-7, for which M was one of the Commissioners.

p.seg: Dr to the Owners of the S. S. S. You Yangs
All claims to be made before Goods are removed from the Wharf.
